episodes.title: Shunned, And Ex Communicated, Former Jehovah's Witness Turned Activist Through The Arts || Scott
episodes.description: Real stories, told by real people.Happy Holidays, we're back!!! Today, Scott joins us, and he's got a story to tell.Imagine losing everything and everyone. Family, friends, and any support once had, gone.  Because of a difference in belief.  Scott, lost his entire family, 17 members on his fathers side, ex-communicated him.  Scott left the church 15 years ago, and hasn't had any contact with his family for 13 of those 15 years.  In the world of Jehovah's Witness, it's called "shunning - "children being taken ... grand kids being cut off .... tragic family separations"Leaving the church, and the want to remove himself from anything to do with the cult, he eventually moved to Vietnam.  And that's where things get interesting - "I would of probably just lived with that traumatic thing inside, and never said anything about it, but something started happening living there."  From trying to escape his story to becoming an activist.Since 2016, he's been part of a project : The Witness Underground documentary, as well as The Witness Underground podcast. I'd like to welcome another GIANT AMONGST US.  I enjoyed the conversation we had and Scott left a lot of good nuggets on the table, take what you will from it.'Til next timeand very soon,PEACE!!_____FIND OUT WHAT'S ON DECK, UPCOMING STORIES, AND ANYTHING NEW WITH GIANTS AMONGST US :https://www.buymeacoffee.com/Giantsamongstus_____Scott Homan :Website : WitnessUnderground.com | BananaIslandFilms.comTwitter : @WitnessFilmsInstagram : @WitnessUndergroundYoutube : Youtube.com/@WitnessUndergroundFacebook : WitnessUndergroundSupport : Patreon.com/WitnessUnderground-> Also 50% off discount to watch link (RENT (one week watch) or BUY (download))https://vimeo.com/r/3M2P/VC9vbnNNdm_____More of Giants Amongst Us :Website : https://giantsamongstus.comTo Share Your Story : giantsamongstus@tutanota.comReddit : https://www.reddit.com/r/Giants_Amongst_Us/Follow on Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/giantsamongstus/_____Background music by :@bnoizemusic

episodes.title: From The Fetus, Indoctrinated And Conditioned To Be A Jehovah's Witness || F.S
episodes.description: Real stories, told by real people.Today, F.S. joins us and he's got a story to tell. From the womb, indoctrination is encouraged by Jehovah's Witness. The listening of tapes, and sermons out loud while pregnant was something his mother did, says F.S - "my doctrination started before I was born." Child to teenager, then to an adult, F.S, his whole world revolved around a governing body, the ruling council of Jehovah's Witness.There's a lot to unpack, and F.S does a great job in doing this. Sharing life growing up as a Jehovah's Witness. The trauma instilled in him as a child, because of Armageddon, and the destruction that was to follow -"It made me suicidal big time, as a child, the first suicidal thought I had, I was 10 years old." F.S. also shares with us, in detail, the death and abuse this organization is responsible for. It'll be surprising for some.Just recently (a couple years ago) he separated himself from the organization, and because of it, lost everything. Family, friends, and ultimately the world as he knew it. Leaving him at ground zero, and alone in a world he was programmed to believe was against him. He had his truth, his conviction, and an awakening. But, it came with a price. That's his reason for wanting to share his story with us today. He's angry, and rightfully so. Another GIANT AMONGST US, with a passion and desire to bring awareness and shed light on what's really going on behind the curtain, of what he calls, a cult.If you enjoyed the Show, you can support it at no cost at all. Simple as giving a rating and review, if you feel it's been of value to you. We appreciate the feedback. Word a mouth is still the best advertisement, so if you know someone who also may find value in any of these stories, share it with them.'Til next timeand very soon,PEACE!!_____FIND OUT WHAT'S ON DECK, UPCOMING STORIES, AND ANYTHING NEW WITH GIANTS AMONGST US :https://www.buymeacoffee.com/Giantsamongstus_____Links and references exposing JW's history and doctrines :Website : https://avoidjw.org/Youtube : https://youtube.com/@altworldly?si=S3Vo-AYASluB7OuRYoutube : https://youtube.com/@Self-AwareNPC?si=UUDVlHEIrdmm2rWBReddit : https://www.reddit.com/r/exjw/_____More of Giants Amongst Us :Website : https://giantsamongstus.comTo Share Your Story : giantsamongstus@tutanota.comReddit : https://www.reddit.com/r/Giants_Amongst_Us/Follow on Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/giantsamongstus/_____Intro Track :officialfifthmusic.com_____Background music by :@bnoizemusic

episodes.title: Raised In A Cult, Abused As A Child, And The Healing And Forgiveness That Came After || Emmanuel
episodes.description: Real stories, told by real people.We're back!! And I hope this finds you all in good spirits. Today, we're joined by Emmanuel, and he's got a story to tell. He talks about life for him as a child - an abusive mother, being raised in a cult, and kept away from his father, and all alone. When the authorities, police officers, school board members, and other adults did nothing in response to his pleas for help and reports of abuse. Emmanuel out of desperation and fear, fled and ran away at 15 years old.Through all the pain, suffering, trauma and the guilt of blaming himself for the abuse. There's also healing and forgiveness. And Emmanuel, who credits his faith in God for being a reason as to why, years later he was able to forgive his mother for the abuse suffered as a child. That was a big part of his healing. Emmanuel is definitely a GIANT AMONGST US, With new life, purpose, and meaning.If you enjoyed the Show, you can support it with a rating, and leaving a review. And word a mouth is still the best advertisement, so if you know someone who you think might find value in any of these stories, share it with them.'Tilvery soon,PEACE!!_____Connect with Emmanuel :Odysee : odysee.com/$/invite/@EmmanuelGoldstein:dSubscribeStar : subscribestar.com/emmanuel-goldsteinTruth Social : truthsocial.com/@Emmanuel_GoldsteinBitChute : bitchute.com/channel/emmanuelgoldsteinMinds : https://www.minds.com/emanuel_goldstein/?referrer=emanuel_goldsteinYoutube : https://youtube.com/@EmmanuelGoldsteinINGSOC?si=l5KKnhddXbQWb399____More of Giants Amongst Us :Website : https://giantsamongstus.comTo Share Your Story : giantsamongstus@tutanota.comStickers & Other Accessories : https://www.redbubble.com/people/QuotestoChew/shop?asc=uFollow on Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/giantsamongstus/_____Background music by :@bnoizemusic
